from PIL import Image
img = Image.open\('C:/Users/mouti/AndroidStudioProjects/flight-booking-flutter-app-ui-kit-master/assets/splash_screen.gif'\)
total_ms = 0
for i in range\(img.n_frames\):
    img.seek\(i\)
    total_ms += img.info.get\('duration', 100\)
print\(f'Frames: {img.n_frames}'\)
print\(f'Total duration: {total_ms}ms \({total_ms/1000:.1f}s\)'\)
" 2>&1)
